name: circle-to-analyze
description: Screen-Aware Circle-to-Analyze AI Agent (like Google Gemini Circle-to-Search)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run python" "wait-on http://localhost:3000/health http://localhost:5000/health && npm run start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend/python && pip install -r requirements.txt
